author: cmlenz
msg: Migrate the sample-servlet to the proposed Ant integration.

(There are some very weird issues with running the "unit" tests, like OutOfMemory errors and line breaks in JSP responses where they are not expected. The "sample" tests run fine however. All in all, this is just a first attempt and should not be considered stable or anything)

author: cmlenz
msg: Remove tabs

author: cmlenz
msg: Provide boolean property j2ee12.available/j2ee13.available for easier conditionals

author: cmlenz
msg: Copy the Ant integration to the location it is expected to be by ${cactus.antintegration.jar}

author: cmlenz
msg: - Implicitly add the HttpUnit JARs to the client classpath if they are available
- Terminate the build if the ServletRedirector isn't defined in the WUT (war-under-test ;-) )
